case.title: Looking - 21 (Staten Island)
case.text: This is a real and honest post. Im 21, I work and start school again in October. Im looking for someone who would like to hang out on my free time, movies, out to eat, clubs/hookah bar the lists goes on.. I'm a black female, short, and cute. Im looking for someone who is serious about hanging out and getting to know one another and you must live on Staten Island or at least willing to travel here. Send pic, with you reply. Thank you!
